rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading to the living area and kitchen. Designed for natural light with Vastu-aligned orientation.
Large open space promoting natural ventilation and sunlight; features eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient lighting.
Adjacent to the kitchen with a view towards the garden, following Vastu principles for social interaction space.
Compact yet efficient design with energy-saving appliances and proper ventilation; positioned in the northeast to harness positive energy.
Master bedroom located in the southwest for restful sleep; incorporates natural light and eco-friendly insulation.
Compact bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with water-saving fixtures and proper drainage.

openings.description: Main door with natural ventilation; aligns with Vastu for positive energy flow.
Large windows to maximize sunlight and views of the garden, enhancing eco-friendly design.
Double-car garage door with efficient insulation and energy-saving design, ensuring easy access.

amenities.description: Expansive garden area promoting biodiversity, natural cooling and relaxation; integrated with water conservation features.
Well-equipped private gym built using eco-friendly materials; includes energy-efficient lighting and ventilation for a healthy workout environment.
